google_translated: I can not supply power more than I'm giving up Yamato launch ....

en_text: The whole world is sending power to the Yamato.
jp_text: 全世界が ヤマトに電力を回してくれている。
google_translated: The whole world takes power to Yamato.

en_text: Activate the Wave Motion Engine!
jp_text: うむ。　波動エンジン　始動！
google_translated: Um.Wave engine start!

en_text: Activating engine. Connecting flywheel.
jp_text: 機関　始動。 フライホイール　接続。→
google_translated: Engine start.Flywheel connection.→

en_text: Pressure rising. 90%. 96%. 100%.
google_translated: Retained room pressure.90 96 100 →

en_text: Energy charge at 120%.
jp_text: エネルギー充填　１２０％。
google_translated: Energy filling 120%.

en_text: Wave Motion Engine RPMs looking good. Here we go!
jp_text: 波動エンジン　回転数　良好。 いけます！
google_translated: Wave engine speed good.!

en_text: Interplanetary ballistic missile spotted!
jp_text: 惑星間弾道弾　捉えました。
google_translated: I caught the interplanetary ballistic bullet.

en_text: Raise the ship! Remove the camouflage!
jp_text: 船体　起こせ！　偽装解除！
google_translated: Get a hull!Release for spoofing!

en_text: Camouflage...
jp_text: 偽装？　じゃあ→
google_translated: Farewell?Well then →

en_text: Yes, it was the Yamato...
jp_text: そうだ　ヤマトだ。
google_translated: That's right Yamato.

en_text: Space Battleship Yamato!
jp_text: 宇宙戦艦ヤマトだ！
google_translated: Space Battleship Yamato!

en_text: We will shoot down the enemy's interplanetary ballistic missile here.
jp_text: 敵　惑星間弾道弾を ここで迎撃する。
google_translated: Intervaluated inter-enemy planet ballistic bullet will intercept here.

en_text: Prepare to fire main cannon!
jp_text: んん…　主砲発射　準備！
google_translated: Non ... Preparation for main gun firing!

en_text: Set sail! Launch the Yamato!
jp_text: 抜錨！　ヤマト発進！
google_translated: Look out!Yamato start!

en_text: Set sail! Launching the Yamato!
jp_text: 抜錨！　ヤマト発進します！
google_translated: Look out!I will start Yamato!

en_text: Shock cannon has finished receiving energy charge from the engine.
jp_text: ショックカノン エンジンから　エネルギー伝導→
google_translated: Energy conduction from shock canon engine →

en_text: Automatic tracking ready.
jp_text: 自動追尾よし。
google_translated: Automatic tracking.

en_text: Lock on target. Correct for errors -1.3!
jp_text: 照準合わせ。 誤差修正。　マイナス１．３。
google_translated: Reference.Error correction.Minus 1.3.

en_text: Power is coming back on line.
jp_text: 電源　回復します。 おお…。
google_translated: Recover power.Oh….

en_text: The Yamato... did it melt and burn up in the atmosphere?
jp_text: ヤマトは？ 溶けて　蒸発してしまったのでは…。
google_translated: What is Yamato?It has been melted and evaporated ....

en_text: The Yamato is fine!
jp_text: ヤマト　健在なり！
google_translated: Yamato Kenyu!

en_text: Be happy.
jp_text: 素直に喜べよ。
google_translated: Rejoice honestly.
